reviews.review_msg: I highly suggest operation research with this prof. Although she may speak a little bit fast, but her notes are great and supports every assignments you do. There's a group project, so be prepared. Everything in her course are easy to follow.

Dr. Stephen is a professor who genuinely cares for his students. The textbook is very useful, and he regularly responds to emails. Make sure to start assignments early, he is always happy to answer questions. Tutorials are great for practicing new material. This class is time-consuming but really interesting and doable if you put in the work!

genuinely the worst teacher you will ever encounter. Completely clueless in lectures, he says the words ummm or uhhh so much that you might mistake him for a monk who is praying. He has the handwriting of a child, my dog could write neater than him while doing a handstand blind.
Tamon is like a research prof, if you keep attending the lecture, you will get his idea about how to solve the problems, but this course require a bit writing for the assignment
